channel.title: MESG Token trading on BitForex
channel.description:
$MESG is now open for trading at BitForex, one of the leading Asian exchanges, and one of the top ten exchanges by adjusted volume according to CoinMarketCap (21/05/19).

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/mesg-now-listed-on-bitforex/
